key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by gnome-settings-daemon or not

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in gnome-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: recalibrate-display-threshold
key.summary: The duration a display profile is valid
key.description: This is the number of days after which the display color profile is considered invalid.

key.name: recalibrate-printer-threshold
key.summary: The duration a printer profile is valid
key.description: This is the number of days after which the printer color profile is considered invalid.
